resources.string: To start using IrssiNotifier, select the Google account you want to use:
For instructions and help, please visit IrssiNotifier web page or join #irssinotifier @ IRCnet.
IrssiNotifier was created entirely on my free time. If you have found IrssiNotifier useful, please consider buying IrssiNotifier+ or donating at the IrssiNotifier web page to help keep project alive.
Project is open source, see GitHub page for more info.
Thanks to everyone who has donated money or contributed source! Also thanks to everyone working on the Irssi team.
Check IrssiNotifier web site for information about setting up your irssi script.
An error occurred while trying to check IrssiNotifier+ license validity, please try again after a short while. If problem persist, contact support at IrssiNotifier web site. Error:
You have both IrssiNotifier and IrssiNotifier+ installed. Uninstall either, or you\'ll get duplicate notifications.
App licensed, thanks! Your account has been upgraded to Plus and pull notification system has been enabled. Check IrssiNotifier web site for information about setting up your irssi script.
Ensure your internet connection works and try again.
Mystical server error, check if updates are available
Unable to send settings to the server! Please try again later!
Unable to register to GCM! Please try again later!
Unable to decrypt message, is your decryption password correct?
Unable to decrypt data. Perhaps encryption key is wrong?
Unable to parse data. Server error?
